snippet: The ban on American adoptions of Russian children began as a dispute between two countries, but Russians are now fighting among themselves over the ban.
abstract: Ban on American adoptions of Russian children began as dispute between two countries, but Russians are now fighting among themselves over ban.
lead_paragraph: The ban on American adoptions of Russian children began as a dispute between two countries, but Russians are now fighting among themselves over the ban.

headline.seo: Russia’s U.S. Adoption Ban Proves Divisive at Home
headline.main: Trouble in Russia Over Ban of Adoptions by Americans
headline.print_headline: Trouble in Russia Over Ban of Adoptions by Americans
